## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see added.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the use case it addresses.

**Example scenario:**
- As a user deploying Quay, I want to...
- So that I can...
- Instead of having to...

## Proposed Implementation

How do you envision this feature working?

**New Role:**
If proposing a new role, describe:
- Role name and purpose
- Dependencies (which other roles it depends on)
- Configuration variables needed
- Integration points with existing roles

**Enhancement to Existing Role:**
If enhancing an existing role, describe:
- Which role(s) to modify
- What changes are needed
- Backward compatibility considerations

**Example configuration:**
```yaml
# Show how users would configure this feature
new_feature_enabled: true
new_feature_option: "value"
```

## Alternatives Considered

What alternative solutions or features have you considered?

## Benefits

What are the benefits of implementing this feature?
- Performance improvements
- Easier configuration
- Better security
- Enhanced functionality
- Other benefits

## Potential Drawbacks

Are there any potential downsides or challenges?
- Increased complexity
- Breaking changes
- Additional dependencies
- Resource requirements

## Implementation Complexity

How complex do you think this feature would be to implement?

- [ ] Simple (configuration change, small enhancement)
- [ ] Moderate (new role, significant changes to existing role)
- [ ] Complex (multiple roles, architectural changes)

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the feature request here.

**Related documentation:**
- Links to upstream documentation
- Related GitHub issues or PRs
- Examples from other projects

## Contribution

Would you be willing to contribute to implementing this feature?

- [ ] Yes, I can submit a pull request
- [ ] Yes, I can help test
- [ ] No, but I can provide feedback
- [ ] No, I'm just suggesting the idea

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this is not a duplicate
- [ ] I have described the use case clearly
- [ ] I have considered alternatives
- [ ] I have thought about backward compatibility
